description: Explore the transformative impact of NFT royalties on the digital asset landscape, offering sustainable revenue for creators and unique investment opportunities. Discover how smart contracts and blockchain technology facilitate secure and transparent transactions, empowering both artists and investors. Analyze the challenges and future prospects within this evolving market.
keywords: NFTs, NFT royalties, digital assets, creators, investors, smart contracts, blockchain technology, digital economy, investment opportunities, market trends
title: The Evolving Landscape of NFT Royalties: New Opportunities for Creators and Investors
